title: Python Backend Developer (FastAPI, AI Models, Part-Time, Remote)
job_overview:
Looking for a remote Python backend developer to help build an AI-powered financial app that translates user beliefs into real market trades. You’ll work with FastAPI, pandas, and ML models (scikit-learn). The system is already functional and live on Render. You’ll help improve logic, clean code, and push new features weekly.

? Responsibilities:
- Maintain and improve Python FastAPI backend
- Implement ML-based strategy generation (NLP + classification)
- Help integrate Supabase and Render services
- Support light task-based upgrades (1-2 per week)

? Requirements:
- Proficiency in Python, pandas, FastAPI
- Familiar with joblib, scikit-learn, and basic ML concepts
- Git + VS Code workflow experience
- Comfortable working async with minimal hand-holding

???? Bonus if:
- You’re based in the Philippines ????????
- You understand financial markets, AI, or trading
- You like making AI tools feel like a sports betting app

???? Pay: $300–$500/month depending on skill
???? Hours: ~20/week, async, flexible
???? Apply: Send your GitHub, LinkedIn, and past projects

This is a long-term opportunity for someone who works fast, communicates clearly, and wants to grow with a lean AI-powered startup.
